ygData.subject: Re: Bayle List fixed yet?
ygData.msgSnippet: The female cleric gives out a lamo quest to (you got it) kill a messanger. Theres some dumb thing where the Surefall people want stricter penalties on
ygData.messageBody:
The female cleric gives out a lamo quest to (you got
it) kill a messanger. Theres some dumb thing where the
Surefall people want stricter penalties on poachers.
Get the note form some druid guy turn it back into
her. She then gives you a forged note to take to
someone in Surefall. The quest seems to stop there.
Faction adjustments and a few coppers is all that
results.

--- Chip Paul <cpaul@...> wrote:
> Anyone know if they've fixed the Bayle List quest
> yet? I'm
> referring to the Freeport quest. I petition every
> few days about
> it, but unless a GM is on, noone even knows what
> quest I'm talking
> about, and even the server GM wasn't sure last time
> I petitioned.
>
> Anyone tried to finish it recently?
>
> And while I'm posting, in the Bloodsaber guild there
> is a cleric
> who mentions serving the Lord of Disese
> (misspelled), but I
> couldn't make her talk. Anyone know what the deal
> is there? I'm
> ready to do some Qeynos quests now that I'm amiable,
> but I can't
> find anything other than the kill
> paladins/drosco/clothspinner/trumpy
> quests.
>
> Xilith
>
>
